flavor_text_entries.black:
It can make its breath freeze at will.
Very able in the water, it swims around
in northern seas and catches prey.
flavor_text_entries.white:
It freezes its breath to create
fangs and claws of ice to fight with.
Cold northern areas are its habitat.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
They love the cold seas of the north.
They create pathways across the ocean
waters by freezing their own breath.
flavor_text_entries.white-2:
They love the cold seas of the north.
They create pathways across the ocean
waters by freezing their own breath.
flavor_text_entries.x:
They love the cold seas of the north. They create
pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their
own breath.

flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:

pathways across the ocean waters by freezing their

flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
It freezes its breath to create fangs and claws of ice
to fight with. Cold northern areas are its habitat.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
It swims through frigid seas, searching for prey.
From its frozen breath, it forms icy fangs that
are harder than steel.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
It swims energetically through frigid seas.
When it gets tired, it freezes the seawater
with its breath so it can rest on the ice.
